data.title: Great place!
data.text: My son expects his birthday here now! He loves the mouse down the street, but when it comes to birthdays, they don't compare. Personalized host who is very attentive. The cake is actually delicious. Punch and pizza are a big hit with the kiddos. The jump houses are anything but typical with huge pirate ships, batman, circus slides, obstacle courses, etc! The lizard dances with the gang... You get a pic... Cheaper than throwing the party at my house and I didn't have to clean anything!
